creator: sacsha30@gmail.com
text:
I am trying to apply fallback to my publication modules' resources like javascript, css etc as:

<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="/modules/examplemodule/css/test.css"/>

but it is not able to override the code in $LENYA/src/modules/examplemodule/css/test.css with the code $MYPUB/lenya/modules/examplemodule/css/test.css.
